Aden Vanguard Captain Adolph:
Hush! Want to know what are we doing here? Once we got here, it means that the situation requires!
You know that originally it was the site of the dark elves? However, recently the area has changed a lot. Vanguard secretly arrived from Aden to find out what happened here. Arriving here, we found that the Embryo has built a huge fortress. Looks like they were serious.
We are going to capture the Fortress of Astatine and find out what you're up to Embryo. Other members of the avant-Garde now take positions around the fortress.
